verses.verse: Against <S%H4124>Moab<s%> thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>! for it is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>: <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> and <S%H3920>taken<s%>: <S%H4869>Misgab<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> and <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>.

There shall be no more <S%H8416>praise<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> they have <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against it; <S%H3212>come<s%>, and let us cut it <S%H3772>off<s%> from being a <S%H1471>nation<s%>. Also thou shalt be cut <S%H1826>down<s%>, O <S%H4086>Madmen<s%>; the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H3212>pursue<s%> <S%H310>thee<s%>.
A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H6818>crying<s%> shall be from <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%>, <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>; her little <S%H6810>ones<s%> have caused a <S%H2201>cry<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%>.

For in the going <S%H4608>up<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> <S%H1065>continual<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%>; for in the going <S%H4174>down<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> the <S%H6862>enemies<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6818>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.
<S%H5127>Flee<s%>, <S%H4422>save<s%> your <S%H5315>lives<s%>, and <S%H1961>be<s%> like the <S%H6176>heath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

¶ For because thou hast <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thy <S%H4639>works<s%> and in thy <S%H214>treasures<s%>, thou shalt also be <S%H3920>taken<s%>: and <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%> with his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon every <S%H5892>city<s%>, and no <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%>: the <S%H6010>valley<s%> also shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, and the <S%H4334>plain<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>spoken<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H6731>wings<s%> unto <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, that it may <S%H5323>flee<s%> and get <S%H3318>away<s%>: for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8047>desolate<s%>, without any to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2004>therein<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7423>deceitfully<s%>, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> be he that keepeth <S%H4513>back<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> from <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

¶ <S%H4124>Moab<s%> hath been at <S%H7599>ease<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth<s%>, and he hath <S%H8252>settled<s%> on his <S%H8105>lees<s%>, and hath not been <S%H7324>emptied<s%> from <S%H3627>vessel<s%> to <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, neither hath he <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>: therefore his <S%H2940>taste<s%> <S%H5975>remained<s%> in him, and his <S%H7381>scent<s%> is not <S%H4171>changed<s%>.

Therefore, behold, the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> unto him <S%H6808>wanderers<s%>, that shall cause him to <S%H6808>wander<s%>, and shall <S%H7324>empty<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and <S%H5310>break<s%> their <S%H5035>bottles<s%>.

And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%>, as the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> their <S%H4009>confidence<s%>.
¶ How <S%H559>say<s%> ye, We are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> and <S%H2428>strong<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> for the <S%H4421>war<s%>?

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, and gone <S%H5927>up<s%> out of her <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
The <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>, and his <S%H7451>affliction<s%> <S%H4116>hasteth<s%> <S%H3966>fast<s%>.

All ye that are <S%H5439>about<s%> him, <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> him; and all ye that <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%>, How is the <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and the <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H4731>rod<s%>!

Thou <S%H1323>daughter<s%> that dost <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, come <S%H3381>down<s%> from thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H6772>thirst<s%>; for the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> upon thee, and he shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thy strong <S%H4013>holds<s%>.

O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H6822>espy<s%>; <S%H7592>ask<s%> him that <S%H5127>fleeth<s%>, and her that <S%H4422>escapeth<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, What is <S%H1961>done<s%>?

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%>; for it is broken <S%H2865>down<s%>: <S%H3213>howl<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%>; <S%H5046>tell<s%> ye it in <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>,
And <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>; upon <S%H2473>Holon<s%>, and upon <S%H3096>Jahazah<s%>, and upon <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%>,
And upon <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and upon <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, and upon <S%H1015>Beth-diblathaim<s%>,
And upon <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%>, and upon <S%H1014>Beth-gamul<s%>, and upon <S%H1010>Beth-meon<s%>,
And upon <S%H7152>Kerioth<s%>, and upon <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>, and upon all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H7350>far<s%> or <S%H7138>near<s%>.
The <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is cut <S%H1438>off<s%>, and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Make ye him <S%H7937>drunken<s%>: for he <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H4124>Moab<s%> also shall <S%H5606>wallow<s%> in his <S%H6892>vomit<s%>, and he also shall be in <S%H7814>derision<s%>.

For was not <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H7814>derision<s%> unto thee? was he <S%H4672>found<s%> among <S%H1590>thieves<s%>? for <S%H1767>since<s%> thou <S%H1697>spakest<s%> of him, thou <S%H5110>skippedst<s%> for joy.

O ye that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H5800>leave<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and be like the <S%H3123>dove<s%> that maketh her <S%H7077>nest<s%> in the <S%H5676>sides<s%> of the <S%H6354>hole's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, (he is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1343>proud<s%>) his <S%H1363>loftiness<s%>, and his <S%H1346>arrogancy<s%>, and his <S%H1347>pride<s%>, and the <S%H7312>haughtiness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; but it shall not be so; his <S%H907>lies<s%> shall not so <S%H6213>effect<s%> it.

Therefore will I <S%H3213>howl<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and I will cry <S%H2199>out<s%> for all <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; mine heart shall <S%H1897>mourn<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7025>Kir-heres<s%>.

O <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>, I will <S%H1058>weep<s%> for thee with the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>: thy <S%H5189>plants<s%> are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, they <S%H5060>reach<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>: the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon thy summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and upon thy <S%H1210>vintage<s%>.

And <S%H8057>joy<s%> and <S%H1524>gladness<s%> is <S%H622>taken<s%> from the plentiful <S%H3759>field<s%>, and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and I have caused <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H7673>fail<s%> from the <S%H3342>winepresses<s%>: none shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> with <S%H1959>shouting<s%>; their <S%H1959>shouting<s%> shall be no <S%H1959>shouting<s%>.

From the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> even unto <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>, and even unto <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>, have they <S%H5414>uttered<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, from <S%H6820>Zoar<s%> even unto <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%>, as an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of three years <S%H7992>old<s%>: for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> also of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> shall be <S%H4923>desolate<s%>.

Moreover I will cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, him that <S%H5927>offereth<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and him that burneth <S%H6999>incense<s%> to his <S%H430>gods<s%>.

Therefore mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1993>sound<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like <S%H2485>pipes<s%>, and mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1993>sound<s%> like <S%H2485>pipes<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7025>Kir-heres<s%>: because the <S%H3502>riches<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>gotten<s%> are <S%H6>perished<s%>.

For every <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H7144>bald<s%>, and every <S%H2206>beard<s%> <S%H1639>clipped<s%>: upon all the <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H1417>cuttings<s%>, and upon the <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>.

There shall be <S%H4553>lamentation<s%> generally upon all the <S%H1406>housetops<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> thereof: for I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

They shall <S%H3213>howl<s%>, saying, How is it broken <S%H2865>down<s%>! how hath <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H6203>back<s%> with <S%H954>shame<s%>! so shall <S%H4124>Moab<s%> be a <S%H7814>derision<s%> and a <S%H4288>dismaying<s%> to all them <S%H5439>about<s%> him.
For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, he shall <S%H1675>fly<s%> as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> over <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

<S%H7152>Kerioth<s%> is <S%H3920>taken<s%>, and the strong <S%H4679>holds<s%> are <S%H8610>surprised<s%>, and the mighty <S%H1368>men's<s%> <S%H3820>hearts<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs<s%>.
And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from being a <S%H5971>people<s%>, because he hath <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H6343>Fear<s%>, and the <S%H6354>pit<s%>, and the <S%H6341>snare<s%>, shall be upon thee, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

He that <S%H5127%H5211>fleeth<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6354>pit<s%>; and he that getteth <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H6354>pit<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare<s%>: for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon it, even upon <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

They that <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> because of the <S%H3581>force<s%>: but a <S%H784>fire<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and a <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H996>midst<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>, and shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H7588>tumultuous<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%>.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> be unto thee, O <S%H4124>Moab<s%>! the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%>: for thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H7633>captives<s%>.

¶ Yet will I bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. Thus <S%H2008>far<s%> is the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.
